title: Amazon KDP Book Research 2025 | Find Profitable Niches & Keywords (Beginner Friendly)
description:
Learn how to research profitable book ideas on Amazon KDP. In this video I’ll show you how to find niches and keywords, analyze competitors and discover what sells — all using free tools. Perfect for beginners starting their publishing journey in 2025.

📌 Want one-on-one help with KDP niche and keyword research?
Check the pinned comment to contact me directly on WhatsApp for personal guidance.

#amazonkdp #selfpublishing #makemoneyonline
